ygData.subject: Re: Illusion Cards
ygData.msgSnippet: you have to follow the guard around on his whole patrol the card by BB is the first one he drops ... and he doesn t drop the last until he gets back to the
ygData.messageBody:
you have to follow the guard around on his whole patrol the card by BB is
the first one he drops ... and he doesn't drop the last until he gets back
to the guard tower... which he never does without a little help from use
friendly PC's due to his incedible wimpyness and burning desire to kill
everythig in sight... thus you have to following him around the whole way..
killing evrything he attacks and picking up after him...

Good luck

Aerowynn, the Whistling Wanderer

----- Original Message -----
From: Magis <Magis@...>
To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 7:11 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Illusion Cards


> From: Magis <Magis@...>
>
> Phillip Ratliff wrote:
>
> > From: Phillip Ratliff <p_ratliff@...>
> >
> > Ok I'm trying to do the Illusion card quest in Qeynos Hills. I found
> > one card just laying on the ground. Who drops them and when? I thought
> > it was a guard, but do I just follow him around hoping he drops it or
something?
> >
>
> he All ways Drops one right in front of BB when he gets there sometimes he
picks it
> back up .. Its for quest in Fp.
>
>
>
>

>
